mapper.insert: insert into supplyio(recordid, supplierid, mainid, itemid, qty, timestamp) values (#{recordId}, #{supplierId}, #{mainSiteId}, #{itemId}, #{qty}, #{timeStamp})
mapper.select: select sid as supplierId, brandname, manager, tel, email, province, city, region, addr from supplier,supplyio where sid = supplierid and recordid = #{recordId}
